entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
